snippet: Oil prices take a tumble. | An innovative lawsuit is putting United States-backed mortgages to the test. | A hedge fund titan is ordered to pay is former wife $531 million to settle their divorce. | Vodafone is said to be considering a move for...
abstract: Oil prices take a tumble. | An innovative lawsuit is putting United States-backed mortgages to the test. | A hedge fund titan is ordered to pay is former wife $531 million to settle their divorce. | Vodafone is said to be considering a move for Liberty Global.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Oil Prices in Free Fall
